report.title: Get Map Hierarchy To Current Position.
report.description: Returns the hierarchy of the Cudi Site Hierarchy Navigator to the currently selected map layer. This is used to build the map breadcrumb. Note this is ordered correctly in the application code rather than the SQL.
report.query: SELECT DISTINCT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations lcu on lcu.id=#location_id# WHERE st_intersects(COALESCE(l.boundary_geom,l.centroid_geom), COALESCE(lcu.boundary_geom,lcu.centroid_geom)) AND l.deleted = false AND #website_filter# and l.location_type_id in (#location_type_ids#)
